sentence.Network_en: Young children have difficulty grasping the finality of death.

sentence.Network_en: "Not this time, Faye," he replied with finality.
sentence.Network_cn: “这次不行，费伊，”他斩钉截铁地说。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French finalité, from late Latin finalitas, from Latin finalis (see final)

entry.tran: 终结性;决定性;不可改变性
entry.def: Finality is the quality of being final and impossible to change. If you say something with finality, you say it in a way that shows that you have made up your mind about something and do not want to discuss it further.

example.ex: Young children have difficulty grasping the finality of death...
example.tran: 小孩子很难理解死亡的不可改变性。

example.ex: 'Not this time, Faye,' he replied with finality.
example.tran: “这次不行，费伊，”他斩钉截铁地说。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being final or definitely settled;

auth_sentence.content: It has a ring of Newtonian finality to it.

auth_sentence.content: It is the finality of it that's quite frightening.

stems_affixes.type_exp: =limit,boundary,end 表示"结束,范围,界限,限制"

stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+fin界限+ite……的→adj.明确的, 一定的
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+al……的→adj.最后的,最终的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ite……的→adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
af一再+fin界限+ity表名词→进入范围内→密切关系

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定义,解释;[轮廓影像等的]清晰度;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+fin界限+ition表名词→划出界限→定义
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ale表示音乐类→终曲
final[adj.最后的,最终的]+ity表名词→n.结尾,定局,终结
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+itude状态→n.有限
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ity表名词→n.有限, 限定
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
infinite[adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限]+itude状态→infinitude无限,无穷数
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
